Entities.Name: General Fall History
Entities.Definition: References to any past events where the patient has fallen, regardless of the specific time frame.

Sample Data.Sentence: The patient has a history of multiple falls in the past year.
Sample Data.Annotated: General Fall History: multiple falls in the past year

Entities.Name: Fall Risk
Entities.Definition: Assessments or mentions indicating the patient's risk of falling, based on factors like balance, medication, or environmental hazards.

Sample Data.Sentence: Assessment shows high fall risk due to poor balance.
Sample Data.Annotated: Fall Risk: high due to poor balance

Entities.Name: Fall Prevention Interventions
Entities.Definition: Specific actions taken or recommended to prevent falls, such as physical therapy, home modifications, or use of assistive devices.

Sample Data.Sentence: Implemented fall prevention measures including installing grab bars and non-slip mats.
Sample Data.Annotated: Fall Prevention Interventions: grab bars, non-slip mats

Entities.Name: Falls within 2 Days of Note
Entities.Definition: Mentions of falls that occurred within two days prior to the date of the clinical note.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient reported falling yesterday, no injuries noted.
Sample Data.Annotated: Falls within 2 Days of Note: fell yesterday

Entities.Name: Falls within 2 Weeks of Note
Entities.Definition: Mentions of falls that occurred within two weeks prior to the date of the clinical note.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient had a fall last week, resulting in a bruised arm.
Sample Data.Annotated: Falls within 2 Weeks of Note: fell last week

Dataset.Name: Homecare Visit Notes Dataset
Dataset.Details: A dataset comprising 1,149,586 homecare visit notes for 89,459 patients, collected from a large US-based homecare agency, used to train and evaluate the NLP models described.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The annotations were performed using a combination of rule-based and machine learning techniques, specifically using the NimbleMiner tool, which leverages word embeddings to enhance the extraction process.
